title: ‘Vaccines promise a healthier future’ - Pakistan - DAWN.COM
content:
ISLAMABAD: Vacc­i­nes are not just doses of protection, but are promises of a healthier and brighter future, said Kinzul Eman, the CEO of Dopasi Foundation.

Speaking at an event held to mark the “World Immunisation Week” here, she said that too many children remain unprotected due to gaps in access and awareness. The programme was arranged at F-9 Park.

The Dopasi Foundation, in collaboration with Gavi, the Vaccine Alliance, UNICEF, and the Federal Directorate of Immun­isa­tion (FDI), led a nationwide outreach campaign to promote life-saving power of vaccines and ensure equitable access for all.

Strong public-private partnerships, including Gavi and Unicef, play a vital role in providing vaccines that protect against measles, polio, and other diseases.

Published in Dawn, May 2nd, 2025
